title: GasID NFT IPFS Record
description: Complete GasID NFT IPFS record including fixed attributes and detailed carbon emissions prevention data

$schema.title: JSON Schema URI
$schema.description: URI of the JSON Schema used to validate this record

hash.title: Schema Hash
hash.description: Keccak256 hash of the JSON Schema this record was validated against

anyOf.title: Keccak256 Hash
anyOf.description: Keccak256 cryptographic hash as hexadecimal string

version.title: Schema Version
version.description: Version of the schema, using semantic versioning

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: ISO 8601 creation timestamp for this record

external_id.title: External ID
external_id.description: Off-chain reference ID (UUID from Carrot backend)

original_content_hash.title: Original Content Hash
original_content_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the original JSON content including private data before schema validation

content_hash.title: Content Hash
content_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of RFC 8785 canonicalized JSON after schema validation

name.title: Creator Name
name.description: Company or individual name that created this record

relationships.title: Relationships
relationships.description: References to other IPFS records this record relates to

target_uri.title: Target IPFS URI
target_uri.description: Target IPFS URI of the referenced record

type.title: Relationship Type
type.description: Type of relationship to the referenced record

description.title: Relationship Description
examples: This record supersedes the previous version
Child record derived from this parent

deployment.title: Deployment Environment
deployment.description: System environment where this record was generated

data_set_name.title: Data Set Name
data_set_name.description: Name of the data set for this record

data.title: GasID Data
data.description: Complete data structure for GasID certificate

summary.title: GasID Summary
summary.description: Summary information for the GasID certificate

prevented_co2e_kg.title: Prevented Emissions (CO₂e kg)
prevented_co2e_kg.description: CO₂e weight of the prevented emissions

external_url.title: Methodology External URL
external_url.description: URL to view the methodology on Carrot Explorer

uri.title: Methodology IPFS URI
uri.description: IPFS URI to the methodology record

date.title: Audit Date
date.description: Date when the audit was completed

external_url.title: Audit External URL
external_url.description: URL to view the audit on Carrot Explorer

rules_executed.title: Rules Executed
rules_executed.description: Number of rules executed during the audit

report.title: Audit Report
report.description: IPFS URI of the audit report

token_id.title: MassID Token ID
token_id.description: NFT token ID of the MassID

external_url.title: MassID External URL
external_url.description: URL to view the MassID on Carrot Explorer

uri.title: MassID IPFS URI
uri.description: IPFS URI of the MassID record

primary_type.title: Source Waste Primary Type
primary_type.description: Primary type of the source waste

net_weight_kg.title: Source Waste Net Weight
net_weight_kg.description: Net weight of the source waste

administrative_division.title: Administrative Division
administrative_division.description: State, province, or administrative region name

administrative_division_code.title: ISO Administrative Division Code
administrative_division_code.description: Administrative division code following ISO 3166-2 standard

country_code.title: ISO Country Code
country_code.description: Two-letter country code following ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 standard

responsible_participant_id_hash.title: Responsible Participant ID Hash
responsible_participant_id_hash.description: Anonymized ID of the participant responsible for this location

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Geographic latitude coordinate in decimal degrees with maximum 3 decimal places precision (~100m-1km accuracy for city-level, non-PII compliance)

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: Geographic longitude coordinate in decimal degrees with maximum 3 decimal places precision (~100m-1km accuracy for city-level, non-PII compliance)

facility_type.title: Facility Type
facility_type.description: Type of facility in the waste management chain

prevented_emissions_calculation.title: Prevented Emissions Calculation
prevented_emissions_calculation.description: Details of the prevented emissions calculation

formula.title: Calculation Formula
formula.description: Formula used to calculate the prevented emissions

method.title: Calculation Method
method.description: Method used to calculate the prevented emissions

date.title: Calculation Date
date.description: Date when the calculation was performed

values.title: Calculation Values
values.description: Values used to calculate the prevented emissions

items.title: Calculation Value
items.description: Single value used in the emissions calculation

reference.title: Calculation Reference
reference.description: Reference symbol used in the calculation formula

value.title: Calculation Value
value.description: Numeric value for this calculation parameter

label.title: Calculation Label
label.description: Human-readable label for this calculation value
examples: Prevented Emissions by Waste Subtype and Baseline Per Ton

accredited_participants.title: Accredited Participants
accredited_participants.description: List of participants with valid accreditations

items.title: Accredited Participant
items.description: Participant with valid accreditation in the supply chain

role.title: Participant Role
role.description: Role of the participant in the supply chain

accreditation_id.title: Accreditation ID
accreditation_id.description: Unique identifier for the participant accreditation

external_url.title: Participant Accreditation External URL
external_url.description: URL to view the participant accreditation on Carrot Explorer

reward_allocations.title: Reward Allocations
reward_allocations.description: Rewards percentage allocated to each participant

items.title: Reward Allocation
items.description: Reward allocation for a specific participant

participant_id.title: Participant ID
participant_id.description: Unique identifier for the participant receiving the reward

participant_name.title: Participant Name
participant_name.description: Name of the participant receiving the reward

role.title: Participant Role
role.description: Role of the participant in the supply chain

reward_percentage.title: Reward Percentage
reward_percentage.description: Reward percentage allocated to the participant

large_business_discount_applied.title: Large Business Discount Applied
large_business_discount_applied.description: Whether the large business discount was applied

effective_percentage.title: Effective Percentage
effective_percentage.description: Effective percentage of the reward after discounts

distribution_notes.title: Distribution Notes
distribution_notes.description: Additional notes about the reward distribution

large_business_discount_applied.title: Large Business Discount Applied
large_business_discount_applied.description: Description of the large business discount applied
examples: 50% reduction applied to participants with >$4M annual revenue

redirected_rewards.title: Redirected Rewards
examples: Discounted rewards from large businesses redirected to accredited NGOs

smart_contract_address.title: Smart Contract Address
smart_contract_address.description: A valid Ethereum address in hexadecimal format

name.title: NFT Name
name.description: Full display name for this NFT, including extra context

short_name.title: Short Name
short_name.description: Compact name for UI summaries, tables, or tooltips

description.title: Description
description.description: Human-readable summary of the NFT's role and context. Ideally, maximum 300 characters.
examples: This MassID represents 3 metric tons of organic food waste from Enlatados Produção, tracked through complete chain of custody from generation to composting.
This RecycledID represents 2.5 metric tons of recycled plastic bottles processed by Green Solutions Ltd.

image.title: Image URI
image.description: IPFS URI pointing to the preview image

background_color.title: Background Color
background_color.description: Hex color code for marketplace background display

animation_url.title: Animation URL
animation_url.description: IPFS URI pointing to an animated or interactive media file

external_links.title: External Links
external_links.description: Optional list of public resource links with labels

examples.label: Carrot Explorer
examples.description: Complete chain of custody and audit trail

examples.label: Carrot White Paper
examples.description: Carrot Foundation technical and impact white paper

items.title: External Link
items.description: External link with label and description

label.title: Link Label
label.description: Display name for the external link

url.title: Link URL
url.description: Direct URI to the linked resource

description.title: Link Description
description.description: Optional context about what the link provides

attributes.description: Schema for the fixed set of GasID NFT attributes, enforcing order and type for each trait

max_value.description: Maximum possible value for numeric traits
